Package databases

Class Crud_mongo

java.lang.Object
databases.Crud_mongo
public class Crud_mongo
extends java.lang.Object
Contains all the basic CRUD operation done on MongoDB

    • addWine

      public void addWine​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String variety, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String designation, java.lang.String winery, int price)
      Add a wine, with all his features, on MongoDB but only if it's not already present
      Parameters:
      title - : wine name
      designation - : the name of the wine given to the wine by the producer
      price - : wine price
      province - : production province
      variety - : types of grapes used
      winery - : producer
      country - : production country

    • createWine

      public void createWine​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String variety, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String designation, int price, java.lang.String taster_name, int points, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String winery, java.lang.String taster_twitter_handle, java.lang.String country_user, java.lang.String mail) throws ReviewAlreadyInserted
      Function used by scraper to populate MongoDB with new Wines and associated reviews
      Parameters:
      title - : wine name
      designation - : the name of the wine given to the wine by the producer
      price - : wine price
      province - : production province
      variety - : types of grapes used
      winery - : producer
      country - : production country
      country - : user's country
      mail - : user's email
      description - : comment body
      points - : wine's rating
      Throws:
      ReviewAlreadyInserted

    • deleteWine

      public void deleteWine​(java.lang.String title)
      Delete a wine by his name
      Parameters:
      title - : wine's name to delete

      public Wine findSpecificWine​(java.lang.String title) throws WineNotExistsException
      Find a wine and its features by its name
      Parameters:
      title - : Wine's name
      Returns:
      wine: retrieved wine
      Throws:
      WineNotExistsException

    • deleteComment

      Parameters:

      taster_name - : username

    • addComment

      public void addComment​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String taster_name, int score, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String taster_twitter_handle, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String email) throws WineNotExistsException, ReviewAlreadyInserted
      Add a comment for a given wine
      Parameters:
      title - : wine's name
      taster_name - : username that made the comment
      score - : rating associated to wine
      description - : comment associated to wine
      taster_twitter_handle - : twitter nickname of user that did the comment
      country - : user's country
      email - : user's email
      Throws:
      WineNotExistsException
      ReviewAlreadyInserted

      Throws:
      UserNotPresentException

    • findWineByPrefix

      public java.util.ArrayList<Wine> findWineByPrefix​(java.lang.String prefix) throws WineNotExistsException
      Retrieve a wine if it contains a given word or multiple word
      Parameters:
      prefix - : substring or entire wine name to retrieve
      Returns:
      wines: list of all wines that contains at least the given word
      Throws:
      WineNotExistsException
